node.title: The most unusual place I have logged into Perl Monks from is:
node.author: McDarren

data.field: my home my home, whilst taking a bath somebody else's home somebody else's home, whilst taking a bath my office/school/university my office/school/university, whilst taking a bath my car, whilst driving a train a bus a boat/ship an aeroplane StarBucks™ a SpaceShuttle a public washroom a private washroom all of the above somewhere else...
